sensor.name: SwingSensor
sensor.description: Provides basic support for perceiving Swing-based GUIs. The configural url provides the creators and processors required to segment the display. If none is provided, default.xml will be used. To enable keyboard/mouse manipulation, use the DefaultKeyboardSensor with the org.commonreality.sensors.swing.SwingActuator

model-extension.name: SwingExtension
model-extension.description: Automatically injects default visual encoders into the model for use with the DefaultSwingSensor.
